name: TypRR
description:
Welcome to the theatrical world of office employment!
Take the role of the middle manager at a generic gray corporation. Your goal in this endless perma death arcade about office work is:
to take on projects
to get payed
to hire people
to take on projects
to get payed
to hire people
to... you get the picture.
Pleasing your boss and workers at the same time is easier said than done!
You will soon realize why the middle manager is the, lets say least favoured employee at most companies.

The game is available on both computer (Linux, Windows and Mac)
An Android version is in the works but not released yet.

With music made by DigohD: 

This game is still in development. Please leave feedback and tell me about what you thought about the game and how you want it improved! 
Thanks!
